analysis.key_quote: This proposed regulation will not improve performance, accountability or responsiveness in federal government, it will in fact make all of those things worse and further this Administration's efforts to undermine non-partisan civil service and make the federal government corrupt, partisan and ineffective.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, arguing that it undermines the non-partisan nature of civil service and could lead to corruption and inefficiency. It raises concerns about politicization and the erosion of due process protections for federal employees.
